Journal.Title: Aviakosmicheskaia i ekologicheskaia meditsina = Aerospace and environmental medicine

Article.ArticleTitle: [Evaluation of the effect of a single dose of phytoadaptogen on human's working ability during long-term isolation].

AbstractText: Findings in the study of the effect of a single dose of a phitoadaptogen on concentration, occulomotor coordination and short-term memory with five human subjects in long-term isolation and confinement (ECOPSY-95) are reported. A complex phitopreparation developed by the Swedish Institute of Remedy Herbs (Heteborg) with tentatively name Adapt was used. Tests based on the double blind method were conducted within 1.5 and 4 hours following taking. Analysis of results displayed a significant improvement of work ability four hours after the single dose of the phitoadaptogen attested by a reduced number of erroneous reproduction of stimulating information from memory. Accuracy of compensatory tracking was found to grow much higher.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Gosudarstvennyĭ nauchnyĭ tsentr RF "Institut mediko-biologicheskikh problem". Shvedskiĭ Institut lekarstvennykh rasteniĭ, Geteborg.

Article.VernacularTitle: Otsenka vliianiia razovogo priema fitoadaptogena na rabotosposobnost' obsleduemykh pri dlitel'noĭ izoliatsii.
